page.title: 06TRERHYNGYLL_ATTITUDES
page.content: Cardiff was used for bigger items because it offers a wider selection of goods at cheaper prices.Cardiff was also the centre for cinemas and nightclubs but all the vale pubs were well attended. Most houses had children , the average being 2. Like the adults they liked the area but complained that they had to travel too far for entertainment and wished there were more local amenities.There is a bus into Cowbridge 3 times a week. Adults would like the village to have gas,mains drainage,a village hall, a shop and a pub. Everyone wished sports facilities were better.There are several important community organisations,a Residents Association, Parish Council and a village Social Committee.
